name: apisculptor
description: Apisculptor is a powerful Node.js tool designed to automate the process of generating RESTful APIs for your TypeORM models. With Apisculptor, you can quickly create a new project, define your TypeORM models, and effortlessly generate CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) APIs for them and also swagger documentaion.
author: VENISH KORAT
